response.body:
{
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Aceh",
    "image_url": "https://encrypted-tbn3.gstatic.com/licensed-image?q=tbn:ANd9GcTq1-lW7jiqnw0ZB2UJcXaqjQnQf0BPh4LfEgKSd4UpMfBi5xqTu7ZdCkt1D_HdSbMWAdPendbEnplUcFq9spP2cvSaAr6O",
    "created_at": "2023-10-24T08:41:10.41019+00:00",
    "island_id": 6,
    "slug": "aceh",
    "vacation_island": {
        "id": 6,
        "name": "Sumatera",
        "slug": "sumatera"
    },
    "destinations": [
        {
            "id": 80,
            "name": "Banda Aceh",
            "slug": "banda-aceh",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revision-2019/all-revision-destination/sumatra/Banda_Aceh.jpg",
            "description": "Its auspicious position on the tip of the westernmost point of the Indonesian archipelago has made the town of Banda Aceh a recognized transit point as well as a hub for education, commerce, and government.",
            "location": "Banda Aceh, Aceh"
        },
        {
            "id": 98,
            "name": "Takengon",
            "slug": "takengon",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revision-2019/all-revision-destination/sumatra/Takengon.jpg",
            "description": "Takengon is a 100 km town from the westernmost edge with population no more than 230,000. Takengon is the capital of Central Aceh district. It sits to offer you a handful of rareness you must see. The food is unique and it’s worth noting.",
            "location": "Aceh Tengah, Aceh"
        },
        {
            "id": 100,
            "name": "Weh Island",
            "slug": "weh-island",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revision-2019/all-revision-destination/sumatra/Weh_Island.jpg",
            "description": "Situated at the entrance way of the Malacca Strait, Weh Island is naturally untouched despite its small size and convenient access. It is another garden often forgotten. Diving in Weh Island is a well established recreational activity.",
            "location": "Sabang, Aceh"
        },
        {
            "id": 102,
            "name": "Destination Name Edited",
            "slug": "destination-name-1",
            "image_url": "Destination Image URL Edited",
            "description": "Destination Description Edited",
            "location": "Destination Location Edited"
        }
    ]
}

response.body:
{
    "id": 15,
    "name": "Bali",
    "image_url": "https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/licensed-image?q=tbn:ANd9GcRaUcifh5ereEe6jqZWOXjbZFXogeqCWrf9gpcdsPIe_wlc6Gk2QqN6AV8LKp2P13l0NNzHUWAbO2E_9y0cGWgSJSathgRR",
    "created_at": "2023-10-24T08:41:10.41019+00:00",
    "island_id": 2,
    "slug": "bali",
    "vacation_island": {
        "id": 2,
        "name": "Bali",
        "slug": "bali"
    },
    "destinations": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Kintamani: Bali's Scenic Gem",
            "slug": "kintamani-balis-scenic-gem",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revision-2019/all-revision-destination/bali-nusa-tenggara/Kintamani.jpg",
            "description": "Explore the scenic gem of Kintamani in Bali. Marvel at Mount Batur's beauty, serene Lake Batur, and captivating volcanic landscapes",
            "location": "Kintamani, Bali"
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "Bali",
            "slug": "bali",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revisi-2020/destinations-thumbnail/Bali-Thumbnail.jpg",
            "description": "Bali is also known as the Land of the Gods with dramatic dances and colorful ceremonies, to its luxurious beach resorts with exciting nightlife and famous for surfers’ paradise.",
            "location": "Bali, Indonesia"
        },
        {
            "id": 3,
            "name": "Sanur",
            "slug": "sanur",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/bali-nusa-tenggara/bali/sanur/thumb-sanur.jpg",
            "description": "The waters of Sanur are protected by a long string of offshore reefs, creating large, warm shallow, safe lagoons that are perfectly clear and excellent for swimming, snorkeling and a whole array of water sports.",
            "location": "Sanur, Bali"
        },
        {
            "id": 6,
            "name": "Mount Agung",
            "slug": "mount-agung",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revision-2019/all-revision-destination/bali-nusa-tenggara/Gunung_Agung.jpg",
            "description": "Standing majestically on the eastern seaboard of Bali is the island’s highest mountain: Gunung Agung or Mount Agung, located in the district of Karangasem. With its summit reaching a height of 3,031 meters above sea level, Mt. Agung affects its surrounding climate. Its western slopes catch the rain clouds making the west side lush and fertile, while its eastern slopes remains dry and barren.",
            "location": "Karangasem, Bali"
        },
        {
            "id": 7,
            "name": "Seminyak",
            "slug": "seminyak",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/bali-nusa-tenggara/bali/seminyak/thumb-seminyak.jpg",
            "description": "Seminyak provides a serene luxury that will fulfill your tropical fantasy. Book your flight and enjoy your stay in Seminyak, Bali!",
            "location": "Badung, Bali"
        },
        {
            "id": 12,
            "name": "Nusa Dua",
            "slug": "nusa-dua",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/bali-nusa-tenggara/bali/nusa-dua/thumb-nusa-dua.jpg",
            "description": "Situated about 40 Km from Bali Island, Nusa Dua features many internationally acclaimed exclusive luxuries that was purposely built to present the natural beauty of the island itself.",
            "location": "Badung, Bali"
        },
        {
            "id": 13,
            "name": "Ubud",
            "slug": "ubud",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revision-2019/all-revision-destination/bali-nusa-tenggara/Ubud.jpg",
            "description": "Have you ever seen the soothing image of rice field terraces in Bali? If you have, then you can also come to see them yourself in Ubud. Ubud offers a soothing vista that everyone needs to start a good day!",
            "location": "Gianyar, Bali"
        },
        {
            "id": 14,
            "name": "Uluwatu",
            "slug": "uluwatu",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revision-2019/all-revision-destination/bali-nusa-tenggara/Uluwatu.jpg",
            "description": "Uluwatu is home of the most famous waves in Bali. The spot offers several waves which are working with different swells and tides. The Peak is best at mid and high tide, closes out at low tide. In front of the cave, it's the most consistant. The Racetracks is at 100 meters further with fast wave, a lot of sections with easy tubes. Best at low tide and at 6 ft which can hold bigger swell. On the right tide and the right swell, 'The Peak' connects with 'Racetraks'.",
            "location": "Badung, Bali"
        },
        {
            "id": 15,
            "name": "Kuta",
            "slug": "kuta",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revision-2019/all-revision-destination/bali-nusa-tenggara/Kuta.jpg",
            "description": "Kuta today has become a popular beach destination in its own right, alive with tourists from all over the world, swimming, surfing or sunbathing by the beach. Others, casually dressed in shorts, T-shirts and flip-flops stroll along its main road, shopping around or enjoying meals at its many open air restaurants. When in Kuta you know that you are in a holiday town, and people here are in a holiday mood.",
            "location": "Badung, Bali"
        },
        {
            "id": 16,
            "name": "West Bali National Park",
            "slug": "west-bali-national-park",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revision-2019/all-revision-destination/bali-nusa-tenggara/West_Bali_National_Park.jpg",
            "description": "West Bali National Park. Home to over a hundred species of wildlife, the national park is best known as the sanctuary of the exotic white Bali Starling, an endemic iconic bird of the island of the gods.",
            "location": "Klampok, Bali"
        },
        {
            "id": 17,
            "name": "Tanah Lot",
            "slug": "tanah-lot",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revisi-2020/revamp-image/destination/thumbnail-tanahlot.jpg",
            "description": "Tanah Lot epitomizes Bali as the romantic island. With temples perched high facing the ocean, it is so easy to feel awestruck with wonders. See for yourself!",
            "location": "Tabanan, Bali"
        },
        {
            "id": 18,
            "name": "Denpasar",
            "slug": "denpasar",
            "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/en/destinations/revision-2019/all-revision-destination/bali-nusa-tenggara/Denpasar.jpg",
            "description": "Denpasar is the main hub in Bali. The international gate to enter this island is The Ngurah Rai Airport in Denpasar. Come explore and have fun!",
            "location": "Denpasar, Bali"
        }
    ]
}

response.body:
[ { "id": 1, "title": "Kelimutu", "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/user-generated-content/ugc-july-2020/gb-en/2.jpg", "content": "

Literally translated as \"the boiling lake\", Kelimutu has three craters that apparently change colors and alternating between green, red, and blue which always independent of one another. Located in Flores, East Nusa Tenggara, you can take public transportation from Moni, the closest small town, to get to the parking lot before Kelimutu’s peak. From there, hike to see the otherworldly spectacle from the top of the world. 📷: @thefreedomcomplex #Kelimutu #EastNusaTenggara #Indonesia #Travel #WonderfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/wonderfulindonesia/", "created_at": "2023-12-14T05:47:04.21066+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.70745619043768, 122.001285552979 ] }, { "id": 2, "title": "Prambanan Temple", "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/user-generated-content/ugc-july-2020/gb-en/3.jpg", "content": "

This picture taken by @furstset shows the 47-meter-tall majestic Prambanan Temple in Yogyakarta. This temple is easy to get to; simply take a bus from Tugu Train Station or Halte Malioboro 1. Dream big. Never stop believing. The Earth is gradually healing. We are waiting for the best time for you to come and visit us. Inspire people to make their own #IndonesiaBucketList by sharing your past travelling moments in Indonesia on your social media. Don’t forget to use hashtag #IndonesiaBucketList and mention us @indtravel or add hashtag #WonderfulIndonesia for a chance to be featured. #TravelTomorrow #StayatHome #ThoughtfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/wonderfulindonesia/", "created_at": "2023-12-14T05:49:11.075918+00:00", "latlng": [ -7.74985980235277, 110.492763519287 ] }, { "id": 3, "title": "Wae Rebo", "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/user-generated-content/ugc-july-2020/gb-en/4.jpg", "content": "

Covered by thin mist all over the village, Wae Rebo in Flores, East Nusa Tenggara is deservingly holding the title \"the town above the clouds\". Reach this truly fascinating traditional village from Labuan Bajo Airport through Ruteng City and then proceed to Denge Village before trekking for 4 hours to Wae Rebo. 📸: @backpackertampan #WaeRebo #EastNusaTenggara #Indonesia #Travel #WonderfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CCLXHikgJ3d/", "created_at": "2023-12-14T05:51:59.861172+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.66418456766955, 120.430755615234 ] }, { "id": 4, "title": "Padar Island", "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/user-generated-content/ugc-july-2020/gb-en/5.jpg", "content": "

How are you doing? We hope you're holding up strong and waiting to fulfill your desire to travel. Let this picture of Padar Island, by @justkay, spark your inspiration. It might not be safe to travel right now, but planning for the future is always good. Inspire people to make their own #IndonesiaBucketList by sharing your past travelling moments in Indonesia on your social media. Don’t forget to use hashtag #IndonesiaBucketList and mention us @indtravel or add hashtag #WonderfulIndonesia for a chance to be featured. #TravelTomorrow #StayatHome #ThoughtfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/wonderfulindonesia/", "created_at": "2023-12-14T07:41:44.695+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.66350575737836, 119.555797576904 ] }, { "id": 5, "title": "Raja Ampat", "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/user-generated-content/ugc-july-2020/gb-en/6.jpg", "content": "

Here’s a bird’s-eye view picture of Raja Ampat, from @thetravelertwins, to inspire you to keep dreaming and never lose hope. The wait is coming to an end. Be a little stronger. Inspire people to make their own #IndonesiaBucketList by sharing your past travelling moments in Indonesia on your social media. Don’t forget to use hashtag #IndonesiaBucketList and mention us @indtravel or add hashtag #WonderfulIndonesia for a chance to be featured. #TravelTomorrow #StayatHome #ThoughtfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/wonderfulindonesia/", "created_at": "2023-12-14T07:42:35.237016+00:00", "latlng": [ -0.263670944336663, 130.542297363281 ] }, { "id": 6, "title": "Pulo Cinta", "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/user-generated-content/ugc-july-2020/gb-en/7.jpg", "content": "

May this picture of Pulo Cinta in Gorontalo, by @backpackertampan, remind you that love is still here, holding us together in these difficult times. Let your dearest ones know how much you love them. • Spark positivity during these hard times by sharing your past moments #WheninIndonesia on your social media. Don’t forget to use hashtag #WheninIndonesia and mention us @indtravel or add hashtag #WonderfulIndonesia for a chance to be featured. #StayatHome #TravelTomorrow #ThoughtfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/wonderfulindonesia/", "created_at": "2023-12-14T07:43:36.921271+00:00", "latlng": [ 0.477298938067199, 122.346410751343 ] }, { "id": 7, "title": "Mount Bromo", "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/user-generated-content/ugc-july-2020/gb-en/8.jpg", "content": "

Stood over 2,329 meters above the sea level and situated 35 kilometers away from the city of Malang, Mount Bromo might not be the tallest mountain in the entire Java, but it sure delivers an otherworldly spectacle. Climbing to the summit takes about 20-30 minutes depending on how quickly you can haul yourself up the sandy slope. Dare to try the challenging experience? A friendly reminder before visiting: a healthy lifestyle determines 📸: @fedorovdmitry #MountBromo #Indonesia #Travel #WonderfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/wonderfulindonesia/", "created_at": "2023-12-14T07:44:31.746056+00:00", "latlng": [ -7.94380633752696, 112.953100204468 ] }, { "id": 8, "title": "Komodo National Park", "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/user-generated-content/ugc-july-2020/gb-en/9.jpg", "content": "

We understand that one needs a lot of patience to remain indoors and avoid traveling at this moment. But your strong patience is what’s needed the most to make this world safe to travel again. Although the site is still temporarily closed, let us add the beauty of Komodo National Park in East Nusa Tenggara to your timeline in the hope that it positively inspires you to create a #TravelTomorrow wishlist. 📸: @van_taylan • • Spark positivity during these hard times by sharing your past moments #WheninIndonesia on your social media. Don’t forget to use hashtag #WheninIndonesia and mention us @indtravel or add hashtag #WonderfulIndonesia for a chance to be featured. #StayatHome #ThoughtfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/wonderfulindonesia/", "created_at": "2023-12-14T07:45:41.330538+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.55657790199829, 119.477005004883 ] }, { "id": 9, "title": "Kenawa Island", "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/user-generated-content/ugc-july-2020/gb-en/10.jpg", "content": "

Let this picture from @sashajuliard virtually transport you to Kenawa Island, West Nusa Tenggara while you keep lying in your bed and #StayatHome. Don’t worry. Soon you will be able to feel the tropical breeze touch your skin again. But right now, it’s time to rest for a while and distance ourselves from the outside world while the Earth heals. #StayatHome #TravelTomorrow

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CNFNxt1gI2E/", "created_at": "2023-12-14T07:46:34.400283+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.49865138931021, 116.833049654961 ] }, { "id": 10, "title": "Kelingking Beach", "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/user-generated-content/ugc-july-2020/gb-en/1.jpg", "content": "

Witness this rare moment captured by @watchluke; a monkey sitting in front of the landscape of Kelingking Beach in Nusa Penida. Nature has a way of showing us some extraordinary sights. So let it heal itself while you stay at home. Inspire people to make their own #IndonesiaBucketList by sharing your past travelling moments in Indonesia on your social media. Don’t forget to use hashtag #IndonesiaBucketList and mention us @indtravel or add hashtag #WonderfulIndonesia for a chance to be featured. #TravelTomorrow #StayatHome #ThoughtfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CBSvt3PAVsO/", "created_at": "2023-12-14T07:47:53.330654+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.7359512161439, 115.45509159565 ] }, { "id": 11, "title": "Rinjani Hill", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1658913572521-9ee54880bf3a?q=80&w=720", "content": "

🌿 Transport Yourself to a Prehistoric Paradise on Lombok Island 🌄

Uncover the wonders of the Jurassic Park track, where time stands still, and ancient landscapes beckon.

This is not just a trek; it's a journey through time itself.

As you venture through this untouched terrain, towering trees will majestically greet you, vibrant green hills will roll as far as the eye can see, and every step will be filled with the thrill of adventure. It's a playground for explorers, hikers, and nature enthusiasts alike.

Immerse yourself in the lush surroundings, listen to the symphony of the wild, and let the sense of awe wash over you. Capture the moments, create lasting memories, and experience the true essence of nature's majesty. 🦖

📍Mount Rinjani, Lombok, West Nusa Tenggara

#WonderfulIndonesia #WonderfulJourney #JurassicAdventure

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CxMqXsxBHe9/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T09:10:30.546723+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.37863790735025, 116.473960876465 ] }, { "id": 12, "title": "Mount Sumbing", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1622635231200-259e6d0e0abb?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Take a look at the vibrant foothills of #MountSumbing and add some colors to your day! Located in #Kaliangkrik, #Magelang, #CentralJava, this #mountain is an active volcano popular among mountain climbers. As can be seen from the picture taken by @herufadhill, incredible scenery surrounds Mount Sumbing. Have you ever explored a mountain surrounded by amazing views in Indonesia? Share your answer in the comments section.

📸 : @herufadhill

#WonderfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CZT8o7mhogG", "created_at": "2023-12-17T07:39:40.218938+00:00", "latlng": [ -7.3820553725106, 110.075840950012 ] }, { "id": 13, "title": "Borobudur", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1689904575573-ac10f7edc6f9?w=720", "content": "

Witness the beautiful morning light caress the legendary #BorobudurTemple!

Being a part of Indonesia’s most precious heritage, it's important to preserve the beauty of this magnificent temple. Here, you can discover plenty of interesting wonders. Have you checked out any of them? Tell us in the comments section.

📍: #Magelang, #CentralJava

📷: @740aerialvideography

#WonderfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CelQoOGhPuH", "created_at": "2023-12-17T08:01:59.619169+00:00", "latlng": [ -7.60800468485983, 110.203825235367 ] }, { "id": 14, "title": "Gili Meno", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1631102402719-da270e2af411?w=720", "content": "

Time for an underwater adventure in Gili Meno, Lombok! Take a closer look at Lombok’s marine life and impressive underwater sculptures. This magnificent view of Gili Meno is nothing less than paradise. We can’t stop daydreaming about it! How about you? Which destination in Indonesia are you daydreaming about right now?

#FromIndonesiawithLove #WonderfulIndonesia #TripofWonders #IndonesiaBucketList

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CINuJ6tA_sN/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T08:10:42.303179+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.35072123391789, 116.057145595551 ] }, { "id": 15, "title": "Holbung Hill", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1591284915748-bc48608e894d?w=500", "content": "

Take me to the stunning Holbung Hill, North Sumatra please! This bird's-eye view captured by @hadipramono82 is absolutely breathtaking! Just look at its scenic sky and lush greenery, I'm falling in love already. 😍 You can catch the incredible sunrise or spend the night gazing at its starry sky. Whichever you prefer, Holbung Hill offers a tranquil escapade!

#FromIndonesiawithLove #WonderfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CIp_iTFA-f5/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T08:16:11.704572+00:00", "latlng": [ 2.53666937211339, 98.7018585205078 ] }, { "id": 16, "title": "Tumpak Sewu", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1593901138884-02ee723a96f7?w=720", "content": "

Java's waterfalls are a place straight out of a movie scene, where cinematic heaven comes to life! 🌊

Each waterfall in Java, with its cascading waters and lush surroundings, feels like stepping onto a film set, where every moment is a frame-worthy spectacle. From hidden gems to majestic drops, Java's waterfalls are a dream for explorers and nature enthusiasts alike.

Ready to be swept away by their beauty?

📍Tumpak Sewu, Lumajang, East Java

#WonderfulJourney #WonderfulIndonesia #JavaWaterfalls #CinematicNature #WaterfallWonderland 🎥🍃💦✨

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/C0f_RTMBpSJ/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T08:19:54.674482+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.15983693386548, 112.983055114746 ] }, { "id": 17, "title": "Bromo Green Hills", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1580575721984-fe16b6b2a87d?w=720", "content": "

The beauty of Mount Bromo is like stepping into a surreal dream. Trekking through its landscapes on horseback, you'll feel as if you've been transported into an old movie scene.

Did you know that Bromo was chosen as the 3rd most beautiful National Park in the world according to the international travel site called Bounce?

📍Bromo Mountain, East Java

#WonderfulJourney #WonderfulIndonesia #BromoAdventure #EpicLandscapes #TimelessTravel

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/C0Vy519BZGJ/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T08:25:51.416394+00:00", "latlng": [ -7.96335749656092, 112.960052490234 ] }, { "id": 18, "title": "Tabanan Bali", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584774148943-0116b853332a?w=720", "content": "

Belimbing Village in Tabanan, Bali, is a treasure trove of stunning, untouched rice terraces. 🌾 Witness their incredible layers weaving a lush green tapestry. Bali's hidden gem!

📍Tabanan, Bali

#WonderfulJourney #WonderfulIndonesia #RiceTerraceBeauty #BaliHiddenGems #LushGreenLayers

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/Cz_dpvhBXTH/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T08:30:03.849935+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.53977221340963, 115.126419067383 ] }, { "id": 19, "title": "Mount Rinjani", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1698267703889-06c41f9acba5?w=720", "content": "

Waking up to the stunning views of Mount Rinjani in Senaru is like stepping into a dream! 🌅🌿 Every glimpse of Lombok's awe-inspiring landscapes makes you feel like the world's luckiest traveler. Huge kudos to @ridho_f.h for perfectly capturing this slice of paradise. Get ready to add this spot to your must-visit list! 😍🗺️

📍Mount Rinjani, Lombok, West Nusa Tenggara

#WonderfulJourney #WonderfulIndonesia #MountRinjaniMagic #BucketListAdventures #NaturePhotographyJoy 🏔️✈️📸 Let the adventure begin!

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/Cz50DiShViC/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T08:33:50.044818+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.42245136625541, 116.47533416748 ] }, { "id": 20, "title": "Pronojiwo", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1642084061764-362276488160?w=720", "content": "

Whisked away by the serene beauty of Pronojiwo, where the towering pines stand guard, enhancing the majestic Semeru in the backdrop. 🌲🏞️

A haven tucked at the foot of Mount Semeru, Java, it's a spectacle where nature's finest elements converge to craft breathtaking scenes that stir souls.

As the sunset paints the sky with mesmerizing hues, it's a moment to pause, reflect, and bask in Indonesia's splendid nature. While the climb to Semeru might be a future adventure, Pronojiwo's charm is ever-present, awaiting your presence to explore its tranquility and marvel at distant, yet so vivid, Semeru. 🌅🍃

📍Pronojiwo, Lumajang, East Java

#PronojiwoParadise #SemeruSerenity #JavaneseJewel #WonderfulIndonesia #WonderfulJourney

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/Cykt313BUTW/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T08:39:42.616681+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.21624753515587, 112.947006225586 ] }, { "id": 21, "title": "Mentawai Beach", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1504682066999-90437076f0dd?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Have you ever stumbled upon a hidden gem during your travels?

Welcome to Sabiret Beach in Mentawai, where pristine beaches meet unique landscapes.

Imagine strolling along the shore, where turquoise waters kiss your feet, and tilted coconut trees create a uniquely picturesque silhouette against the sky.

Accessible only by boat, this secluded paradise awaits your discovery. 🌴🌊🛶

📍Sabiret Beach, Mentawai, West Sumatra

#MentawaiMagic #PantaiParadise #SecludedSerenity

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CyivuZRhNyx/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T08:42:21.910086+00:00", "latlng": [ -1.38139691058791, 98.9016723632813 ] }, { "id": 22, "title": "Nusa Penida", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1604500693431-647f9e76dafc?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Bask in the brilliance of Diamond Beach, Nusa Penida during your visit for the 2023 High Level Meeting of the AIS Forum in Bali, 10-11 October! 🏖️

A jewel of Indonesia, its stunning cliffs and azure waters are a must-see.

📍Diamond Beach, Nusa Penida, Indonesia

#KTTAIS2023 #WonderfulIndonesia #CreativebyIndonesia #KTTAISForum2023 

#HLMAISForum2023 #OurOceanOurFuture #WonderfulIndonesia #WonderfulJourney

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CySw4g7B8Wv/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T08:45:28.108166+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.74749919451425, 115.534629821777 ] }, { "id": 23, "title": "Merbabu", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1685360594641-91fb52833b3b?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Find serenity amidst nature's splendor at Merbabu Mountain, located in Central Java.

Let the harmonious murmur of the wind rustling through lush green leaves and the symphonic chirping of birds bring peace to your soul 🍃.

Embrace the tranquility that rejuvenates both body and spirit as you hike through picturesque landscapes and immerse in the calming ambiance.

Don't miss this haven of peace on your next adventure.

📍Mount Merbabu, Central Java

#WonderfulIndonesia #WonderfulJourney #NatureLovers #SerenitySeekers #MountainAdventures

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CxcxZsQBQ46/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T09:03:36.129422+00:00", "latlng": [ -7.45098595747723, 110.439376831055 ] }, { "id": 24, "title": "Mount Ijen", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1629735990937-8c24ffd1a413?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Greet the day with the transcendent beauty of Mt. Ijen’s morning vistas.

Here, the earth unveils its potent magic with turquoise-colored acidic crater lakes and ethereal blue flames, creating a tableau of nature’s wonders that are both humbling and awe-inspiring. Set your spirit free in this mesmerizing landscape where adventure meets tranquility.

An escapade to Mt. Ijen is more than a journey; it's a passage into the sublime, offering an unparalleled communion with the majestic forces of nature. 🌋

📍Mount Ijen, Banyuwangi, East Java

#MtIjenMagic #MorningViews #TurquoiseLake #NaturalSpectacle #UnforgettableJourneys #WonderfulIndonesia #WonderfulJourney

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CxPosENBh7D/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T09:05:52.165525+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.05850727108773, 114.241976737976 ] }, { "id": 25, "title": "99 Domes Mosque", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1667665061698-461f304cbfa5?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Prepare to be awe-inspired by the architectural marvel of 99 Domes Mosque in Makassar! 😲🕌

This magnificent mosque boasts an incredible 99 domes intricately arranged in a mesmerizing pattern. It's not just a place for prayer; it's a vibrant hub for community gatherings, cultural events, and learning. 🌟

This is the beauty of Makassar and its architectural gem.

Don't miss this wonder!

📍99 Domes Mosque, Makassar, South Sulawesi

#ExploreMakassar #ArchitecturalWonder #WonderfulIndonesia #WonderfulTravel

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CxKGzA9he6s/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T09:07:59.749034+00:00", "latlng": [ -5.14381885480502, 119.404107928276 ] }, { "id": 26, "title": "Mupu Rice Terrace", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1698264779283-c4579c3dace1?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Explore Mupu Rice Terrace in Ubud: tiered green expanses cascading up hills, where the fresh air awakens the senses.

This untouched beauty outshines famed neighbors like Tegallalang and Alas Harum.

Enjoy pristine views by 8 am, breathe in pure oxygen, and bask in the warmth of local hospitality.

Who needs photo edits when the reality is this stunning? 🌾

📍Mupu Rice Terrace, Tegallalang, Bali

#WonderfulIndonesia #WonderfulJourney #UbudHiddenGems #NatureAwakens #RiceTerraceDreams

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CwR27ibuBvi/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T10:37:53.45727+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.43000783796156, 115.32039642334 ] }, { "id": 27, "title": "Komodo Island", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1571366343168-631c5bcca7a4?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Immerse yourself in the wonders of nature at Komodo Island.

Gaze upon the unique blush sands of the Pink Beach and watch as nimble deer dart into the azure sea, a dramatic escape from the island's resident Komodo dragons.

It's a spectacle of survival and beauty, intertwining to create a moment that stays with you long after your footprints fade from the pink sand.

📍Komodo Island, East Nusa Tenggara

#WonderfulIndonesia #WonderfulJourney #NatureSpectacle #PinkBeach #DomodoIsland #TravelMemories

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CvMgJUPBZz3/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T10:41:14.314049+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.56133089156368, 119.467391967773 ] }, { "id": 28, "title": "Misool Raja Ampat", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1637060548964-f064b88cd344?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Experience serene island living at Yapap Homestay, nestled over the tranquil waters of Misool, Raja Ampat.

Accessible by a twice-weekly overnight ferry from Sorong, followed by a local boat ride, this secluded paradise offers the ultimate retreat. Wake up to the soothing sound of waves and panoramic views of the ocean right from your overwater bungalow. There's truly no better way to immerse yourself in Indonesia's stunning natural beauty. 🚤🏝️

Did you know that Raja Ampat has been officially designated as one of the UNESCO Global Geoparks

📍 Yapap Homestay, Misool, Raja Ampat, Southwest Papua

#RajaAmpat #ParadiseUnveiled #IslandLife #WonderfulIndonesia #WonderfulJourney #globalgeopark

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/Curl0UthhfM/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T10:43:00.198499+00:00", "latlng": [ -1.88964909892255, 130.132369995117 ] }, { "id": 29, "title": "Sembalun", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1599372477648-bc918851435b?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Join us on a sky-high journey over Indonesia's vibrant agricultural landscapes.

From up above, the patchwork of colorful fields unfolds like an artist's palette, blending shades of emerald green, gold, and russet into a stunning tableau. Each parcel tells a tale of labor, love, and the bountiful gifts of the earth.

Celebrate the harmonious interplay of nature and agriculture that paints our beautiful homeland.

📍Sembalun, East Lombok, West Nusa Tenggara

#IndonesiaFromAbove #AgriculturalArtistry #WonderfulIndonesia #WonderfulJourney

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CultcPXhaKL/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T10:44:53.209598+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.35418173620506, 116.534729003906 ] }, { "id": 30, "title": "Samosir Island", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1539506804349-39613ff7dec0?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Experience the serene enchantment of Samosir Island, an emerald gem nestled within the sapphire beauty of Lake Toba. 🏞️

As you traverse this idyllic island, allow the vibrant canvas of lush greenery to unfold before your eyes, wrapping you in its peaceful embrace.

Samosir Island isn't just a destination; it's a journey into a world where nature reigns supreme, and every sight, sound, and scent is a testament to its unrivalled splendor.

📍Samosir Island, Toba Lake, North Sumatra

#SamosirSerenity #LakeTobaTranquility #WonderfulIndonesia #WonderfulJourney

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CuWAIBnhjpK/", "created_at": "2023-12-17T10:48:09.780028+00:00", "latlng": [ 2.57765558583831, 98.8126659393311 ] }, { "id": 31, "title": "Pura Ulun Danu Beratan", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1653189382464-25302f3e7409?q=80&w=720", "content": "

The linking theme? They all look spectacular!

If this doesn’t get your urge to visit fired up, I don’t know what will!

It’s a hard choice, but which one of these is your favorite?

📍Pura Ulun Danu Beratan, Tabanan, Bali

Keep in mind to always maintain politeness and be an orderly and responsible tourist.

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CtTYw0hBOLc/", "created_at": "2023-12-18T04:39:09.185331+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.27554329405232, 115.16626060009 ] }, { "id": 32, "title": "Tanjung Aan", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1669901296759-2d44b1227403?q=80&w=720", "content": "

The dramatic sweeping line of the beach and coast at📍 Tanjung Aan Beach, Lombok are captured in this aerial shot by @tur.ojak

Miles of spectacular coastline, all waiting to be explored.

So pack your swimsuit and your walking shoes. It’s time for you to start experiencing #WonderfulIndonesia

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/Csd7lYKB3-0/", "created_at": "2023-12-18T04:43:51.539046+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.91035200907954, 116.328708529472 ] }, { "id": 33, "title": "Nihiwatu Beach", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1678150913309-cbebdf17d804?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Enjoy an aerial shot of 📍 Nihiwatu Beach, East Nusa Tenggara in rich colours and glorious slow motion.

With this clip @alifeiimagined has not just captured the stunning beauty of this stretch of beach, but also the sensation of being there… of how time slows down, and your body relaxes and learns to breathe deeply again.

Just another magical slice of #WonderfulIndonesia that’s waiting for you!

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CsVjSrShww8/", "created_at": "2023-12-18T04:49:12.632034+00:00", "latlng": [ -9.77108522924184, 119.371519088745 ] }, { "id": 34, "title": "Semeru", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1535968881874-0c39f1503640?q=80&w=720", "content": "

Take a look at this breathtaking view of #MountSemeru, one of Indonesia's most #ActiveVolcanoes!

If you're an adventure seeker, a climb up this #MagnificentMountain should be on your bucket list. However, it's important to note that this climb is not for the faint of heart and is only recommended for thrill seekers. 💪 From the summit, you'll be rewarded with breathtaking panoramic views of the surrounding landscape. 🗻

So, pack your bags and get ready for an unforgettable experience! And don't forget to snap some photos to share with the world. #IndonesianAdventures #WonderfulIndonesi

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/CqM_8d-PwDi/", "created_at": "2023-12-18T04:57:03.065163+00:00", "latlng": [ -8.1098763165233, 112.922801971436 ] }, { "id": 35, "title": "Merapi", "image_url": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1535707798491-2303c91896a6?q=80&w=720", "content": "

his photo of Mount Merapi is phenomenal! It absolutely captures the power and beauty of this incredible active volcano.

We’re glad to be a safe distance back to enjoy this spectacular view of nature in action! 😅

A perfect reminder that #WonderfulIndonesia isn’t just tropical beaches and beautiful ocean, but also showcases other incredible landscapes.

", "url": "https://www.instagram.com/p/Cp9R5GchfvG/", "created_at": "2023-12-18T04:59:52.609562+00:00", "latlng": [ -7.54153992647478, 110.44616818428 ] } ]

response.name: Detail Inspiration

header.value: X-CSRF-Token, X-Requested-With, Accept, Accept-Version, Content-Length, Content-MD5, Content-Type, Date, X-Api-Version

response.body:
{ "id": 1, "title": "Kelimutu", "image_url": "https://www.indonesia.travel/content/dam/indtravelrevamp/user-generated-content/ugc-july-2020/gb-en/2.jpg", "content": "

Literally translated as \"the boiling lake\", Kelimutu has three craters that apparently change colors and alternating between green, red, and blue which always independent of one another. Located in Flores, East Nusa Tenggara, you can take public transportation from Moni, the closest small town, to get to the parking lot before Kelimutu’s peak. From there, hike to see the otherworldly spectacle from the top of the world. 📷: @thefreedomcomplex #Kelimutu #EastNusaTenggara #Indonesia #Travel #WonderfulIndonesia
